description:
Ageha begins living at Mashiro’s house and makes herself busy cooking and cleaning for Sora and the gang. Tsubasa worries Ageha is wearing herself out, and Ageha makes a special request to Tsubasa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ageha and Tsubasa Get Colorfully Excited!
Ageha to Tsubasa, Colorful ni Ageteko!
あげはとツバサ, カラフルにアゲてこ!
